titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of educational toys entered in January 3 through April 25, 2004.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of educational toys entered in January 3 through April 25, 2004.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of educational toys and refund any amounts owed.
